cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 6th Nov 2025 (AWST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 6th Nov 2025 (AWST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Basic 10 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Aircon! Free WiFi, linen and towels included, clean facilities, spacious lockers (BYO Lock), electronic key card access to rooms

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 3 nights stay on your dates

privates.name: Superior Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription: Our King Single Room offers hotel grade comforts: 32in LED TV, hotel grade linen, towels, in-room safe; wardrobe, in-room airconditioning controls as well as a desk and chair. Free WiFi is available.
